description:
To-Do List & Calendar

Dida is a powerful to-do & task management app with seamless cloud synchronization across all your devices.
Whether you need to schedule an agenda, make memos, share shopping lists, collaborate in a team, or even develop a new habit, Dida is always here to help you get stuff done and keep life on track.
- Added five new color themes: Teal, Matcha, Lilac, Ebony, and Navy. You can select these in "Settings - Appearance" to give your TickTick a fresh new look.
- Enhanced the task style in the calendar view. The task can now display a checkbox, allowing you to complete tasks with a single click. You can enable this feature by selecting "Detailed" in "Calendar - View Options - Style."
- Added Additional Time Zone, allowing you to view multiple time zones in your calendar. This makes it easier to compare times across different zones. You can enable this feature in "Calendar - View Options - Additional Time Zone."
